name: shared_preferences
description: Flutter plugin for reading and writing simple key-value pairs. Wraps NSUserDefaults on iOS and SharedPreferences on Android.

name: provider
description: A wrapper around InheritedWidget to make them easier to use and more reusable.

name: url_launcher
description: Flutter plugin for launching a URL. Supports web, phone, SMS, and email schemes.

name: google_fonts
description: A package to include fonts from fonts.google.com in your Flutter app.

name: flutter_bloc
description: Flutter Widgets that make it easy to implement the BLoC (Business Logic Component) design pattern. Built to be used with the bloc state management package.

name: geolocator
description: Geolocation plugin for Flutter. This plugin provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API for generic location (GPS etc.) functions.

name: bloc
description: A predictable state management library that helps implement the BLoC (Business Logic Component) design pattern.

name: just_audio
description: A feature-rich audio player for Flutter. Loop, clip and concatenate any sound from any source (asset/file/URL/stream) in a variety of audio formats with gapless playback.

name: flutter_native_splash
description: Generates native code to customize Flutter's default white native splash screen with background color and splash image. Supports dark mode, full screen, and more.

name: animated_text_kit
description: A flutter package project which contains a collection of cool and beautiful text animations.

name: package_info_plus
description: Flutter plugin for querying information about the application package, such as CFBundleVersion on iOS or versionCode on Android.

name: connectivity_plus
description: Flutter plugin for discovering the state of the network (WiFi & mobile/cellular) connectivity on Android and iOS.

name: built_value
description: Value types with builders, Dart classes as enums, and serialization. This library is the runtime dependency.

name: mobx
description: MobX is a library for reactively managing the state of your applications. Use the power of observables, actions, and reactions to supercharge your Dart and Flutter apps.

name: share_plus
description: Flutter plugin for sharing content via the platform share UI, using the ACTION_SEND intent on Android and UIActivityViewController on iOS.

name: flutter_mobx
description: Flutter integration for MobX. It provides a set of Observer widgets that automatically rebuild when the tracked observables change.

name: device_info_plus
description: Flutter plugin providing detailed information about the device (make, model, etc.), and Android or iOS version the app is running on.

name: built_collection
description: Immutable collections based on the SDK collections. Each SDK collection class is split into a new immutable collection class and a corresponding mutable builder class.

name: infinite_scroll_pagination
description: Lazily load and display pages of items as the user scrolls down your screen.

name: characters
description: String replacement with operations that are Unicode/grapheme cluster aware.

name: sentry
description: A crash reporting library for Dart that sends crash reports to Sentry.io. This library supports Dart VM and Web. For Flutter consider sentry_flutter instead.

name: convex_bottom_bar
description: A Flutter package which implements a ConvexAppBar to show a convex tab in the bottom bar. Theming supported.

name: sentry_flutter
description: Sentry SDK for Flutter. This package aims to support different Flutter targets by relying on the many platforms supported by Sentry with native SDKs.

name: rxdart
description: RxDart is an implementation of the popular reactiveX api for asynchronous programming, leveraging the native Dart Streams api.

name: location
description: A Flutter plugin to easily handle realtime location in iOS and Android. Provides settings for optimizing performance or battery.

name: network_info_plus
description: Flutter plugin for discovering information (e.g. WiFi details) of the network.

name: sensors_plus
description: Flutter plugin for accessing accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer sensors.

name: battery_plus
description: Flutter plugin for accessing information about the battery state(full, charging, discharging).

name: googleapis
description: Auto-generated client libraries for accessing Google APIs described through the API discovery service.

name: path_provider
description: Flutter plugin for getting commonly used locations on host platform file systems, such as the temp and app data directories.

name: intl
description: Contains code to deal with internationalized/localized messages, date and number formatting and parsing, bi-directional text, and other internationalization issues.

name: firebase_core
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Core, enabling connecting to multiple Firebase apps.

name: firebase_auth
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Auth, enabling Android and iOS authentication using passwords, phone numbers and identity providers like Google, Facebook and Twitter.

name: sqflite
description: Flutter plugin for SQLite, a self-contained, high-reliability, embedded, SQL database engine.

name: firebase_messaging
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Cloud Messaging, a cross-platform messaging solution that lets you reliably deliver messages on Android and iOS.

name: cloud_firestore
description: Flutter plugin for Cloud Firestore, a cloud-hosted, noSQL database with live synchronization and offline support on Android and iOS.

name: font_awesome_flutter
description: The Font Awesome Icon pack available as Flutter Icons. Provides 1600 additional icons to use in your apps.

name: flutter_slidable
description: A Flutter implementation of slidable list item with directional slide actions that can be dismissed.

name: firebase_storage
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Cloud Storage, a powerful, simple, and cost-effective object storage service for Android and iOS.

name: json_serializable
description: Automatically generate code for converting to and from JSON by annotating Dart classes.

name: win32
description: A Dart library for accessing common Win32 APIs using FFI. No C required!

name: sign_in_with_apple
description: Flutter bridge to initiate Sign in with Apple (on iOS, macOS, and Android). Includes support for keychain entries as well as signing in with an Apple ID.

name: cloud_functions
description: A Flutter plugin allowing you to use Firebase Cloud Functions.

name: bottom_navy_bar
description: A beautiful and animated bottom navigation. The navigation bar use your current theme, but you are free to customize it.

name: flutter_redux
description: A set of utility Widgets that Provide and Connect to a Redux Store

name: chopper
description: Chopper is an http client generator using source_gen, inspired by Retrofit

name: redux
description: Redux is a predictable state container for Dart and Flutter apps

name: flutter_local_notifications
description: A cross platform plugin for displaying and scheduling local notifications for Flutter applications with the ability to customise for each platform.

name: firebase_crashlytics
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Crashlytics. It reports uncaught errors to the Firebase console.

name: mobx_codegen
description: Code generator for MobX that adds support for annotating your code with @observable, @computed, @action and also creating Store classes.

name: android_alarm_manager_plus
description: Flutter plugin for accessing the Android AlarmManager service, and running Dart code in the background when alarms fire.

name: android_intent_plus
description: Flutter plugin for launching Android Intents. Not supported on iOS.

name: built_value_generator
description: Value types with builders, Dart classes as enums, and serialization. This library is the dev dependency.
